title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Julian and Luke
description:
Enjoy this discussion between two of the many Randos who met through Paul VanderKlay.  Julian and Luke discuss Dostoyevsky, Discord and the trajectory of Paul Vanderklay conversations, and more.

Talk to PVK Randos and their ilk here: https://discordapp.com/invite/pmQuHSW

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg

Trailer for "A Hidden Life":
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aC27zIAdPjU

"A Hidden Life" Q&A:
https://youtu.be/xCC_BP6nILA

Good open conversations
Rationalism, ideological possession 
The difference between Doestoyevski and Willliam Lane Craig 
The individual vs the Crowd 
Sacrament and Ritual 
Salience: what different people get out of the conversation
Is Paul's channel being co-opted by rationalists? 
Luke as Shaman
